attributes.review: ⚠️Do not download unless you want all of your stuff to get hacked ⚠️ I woke up to open my social media and some of my pictures were posted without me knowing it‼️ and it makes no sense because I downloaded a VPN❕ In addition, I get like 40-50 notifications every single hour 😑 I just don’t recommend this app 😕💀
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: If I could leave a 0 star review 👎 I would cause this was horrible 👎. When I first got the app I started to smell something bad. And no it was not my pet skunk that had just sprayed 💭 the bug 🐜on the floor it was the app. When I opened it it was so bad I barfed in my cereal 🍵🤢🤮but I still ate it. Guess what I barfed again 🤢🤮bc of the fricken apppp 🤢🤮. I will never ever Ever EVer EVEr EVER DOWNLOAD THIS AGAINNNNNNN 👎👎🤮🤢🥴
attributes.title: Smelled like skunk 🤢🤮

attributes.review: Was very excited to be able to access updates about Trumps campaign in a convenient app, but was VERY disappointed. As soon as I downloaded the app my phone started running slower and occasionally glitching. Only got worse as time went by. Terrible app should be deleted.
attributes.title: Disappointing

attributes.review: Opened the app ready to support my country but then all of a sudden my eyes started to tingle as if my eyes hated the app so much they’d rather melt out of my skull. So they did, now not only have I lost a significant amount of brain cells I’m blind and can’t see I had to get my cat to type all this. Not mad just disappointed, do better😔
attributes.title: Smh do better

attributes.review:
2020 has been the absolute culmination of a failed Administration that seeks the aggrandizement of military, LEO, and Republican Party ass-kissers that toe the administration’s policies:  Stripping healthcare from all but the privileged, zero protections for our environment, zero civil protections from a police force run amuck.
Add to all of this the literal looting of governmental coffers by the Trump family and their cronies.

Delete. This. App.
attributes.title: Fascism shouldn’t be supported by an app!

attributes.review: As a Boomer, I do not approve this awful app. The sound of our orange Oompa Loompa president made my arm flinch as instinct, making me tip over my $200 charcuterie board made of fine cheeses and meats. I demand a $200 tax deduction or a free spray tan at my local spa. I am very mad at you Donald, and to help me relax, I shall go to my local restaurant, leave a 10% tip, and a messy table as I yell at those stupid entitled gen z pests.
attributes.title: Official Boomer Review

attributes.review: Every time i open this app it glitches really bad. Sometimes my screen freezes. And one time my phone just shut off. The last time I opened it my phone exploded and now i’m leaving this review on someone else’s account phone bc this app made my house explode. I wish i could give it negative a zillion stars.
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP

attributes.review:
As soon as I open this app my battery starts TANKING. We’re talking 10% drop in a few minutes - if I leave it open for longer, my phone will overheat and shut down. 

Aside from the battery and heat, it’s GLITCHY. It crashes anytime I do anything too fast... if it doesn’t overheat first. smdh 

Don’t download till they fix...
attributes.title: MAKES MY PHONE OVERHEAT

attributes.review: This app is ugly and gross. I got it because I thought it was gna tell me about restaurants nearby. When I opened it I saw a nasty old orange man and began to profusely vomit. I am not currently in the hospital because I can’t stop vomiting. I don’t know what to do because I don’t have anyone to watch my horses while I’m gone. Can someone come over and bathe me? Thank you.
attributes.title: Ugly

attributes.review: Once I downloaded this app, my phone grew legs and walked away. My phone then went on a plane to Hawaii and went surfing with the McDonalds Clown. Next, my phone swam with a whale shark and visited Nemo in Sydney, Australia. Then, had to stop to charge itself in the Philippines. But after, my phone finally stopped at Greece. MY PHONE DID THIS WITHOUT ME after I downloaded this app. Terrible. Do not get.
attributes.title: Horrible App
